#summary Proposal to add invisible navigation anchors to every heading.

This input

{{{
# Introduction

... text ...

## The *easy* problem
}}}

would produce this output:

{{{
<a id="Introduction></a>
<h1>Introduction</h1>

... text ...

<a id="The_*easy*_problem></a>
<h2>The <emph>easy</emph> problem</h2>
}}}

You can then create a link that jumps to the Introduction as follows:
{{{
[back to Introduction](#Introduction)
}}}
